resources.string: Mr. Owl lost his sight and the ability to find words in his box of letters! OH NO!
Help Mr. Owl by finding the hidden words in a box of scrambled letters
Tap on letters in the same direction in order to highlight and find missing words
Once a word is highlighted tap \"Send the Word,\" if it\'s one of Mr. Owl\'s hidden words, you will earn a STAR!
Earn all 6 Stars and become THE OWL MASTER
Mr. Owl the best word searcher has been blindfolded and needs your help! Help him find his hidden words and become the OWL MASTER.
